text: @RealJamesWoods NYC's population is 18,804,000 and the best #DeBlasio can do for the head of the (don't laugh dammit) Coronavirus Racial Inequality Task Force is..........his wife. It's not because she's black...or his wife. Democrats will make that racist #ChineseVirus sorry it was ever loosed!
